name: preprocessor
author: Daniel Wirtz <dcode@dcode.io>
description: A JavaScript source file preprocessor, e.g. to build different versions of a library.

scripts.make: npm run-script compile && npm test && npm run-script jsdoc
scripts.compile: java -jar closure-compiler/compiler.jar --create_source_map Preprocessor.min.map --compilation_level ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS --externs externs/fs.js --js Preprocessor.js --js_output_file Preprocessor.min.js
